name.ja: <ruby>導<rt>みちび</rt></ruby>きの<ruby>聖<rt>せい</rt></ruby><ruby>女<rt>じょ</rt></ruby>クエム

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "Dogmatika" and "Despia" card.)
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Fallen of Albaz", or 1 card that mentions it, from your Deck to the GY. If a card(s) leaves the Extra Deck: You can target 1 "Fallen of Albaz", or 1 monster that mentions it except "Guiding Quem, the Virtuous", in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Guiding Quem, the Virtuous" once per turn.
